channel.title: Dragon Claws Help
channel.description:
Well i was copying the guide from here:[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392608.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392608.0.html[/url] And i got this error when i got up to the end of the special attack only hitting other players. Ill do npc's soon. But i get these errors once i finished compiling the "client.java" area that i was coding. These are the errors.
client.java:5594: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client DCdown = 4; ^ client.java:5595: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class client DCDamg = true; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
Does anybody know how to fix that? Its a DeltaScape source, so can someone please help??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2010, 11:31:40 am[/size][hr]if i made a mistake i cant fix it now because im going ill fix it later

item.title: Dragon Claws Help
item.dc:creator: @Diablo_Runes Diablo Runes
item.description:
@Diablo_Runes wrote:

Well i was copying the guide from here:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392608.0.html
And i got this error when i got up to the end of the special attack only hitting other players. Ill do npc’s soon. But i get these errors once i finished compiling the “client.java” area that i was coding. These are the errors.

client.java:5594: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable DCdown
location: class client
DCdown = 4;
^
client.java:5595: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable DCDamg
location: class client
DCDamg = true;
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Does anybody know how to fix that?
Its a DeltaScape source, so can someone please help??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2010, 11:31:40 am[/size][hr]if i made a mistake i cant fix it now because im going ill fix it later

Read full topic
